snippet: Five armed and masked men broke into a beach house near the port of Acapulco and raped six Spanish tourists, Mexican authorities said.
abstract: Five armed and masked men break into beach house near port of Acapulco, Mexico, and rape six Spanish tourists.
lead_paragraph: Five armed and masked men broke into a beach house near the port of Acapulco and raped six Spanish tourists, Mexican authorities said.

headline.seo: Six Tourists Are Raped in Home Invasion Near Acapulco
headline.main: Mexico: Six Tourists Are Raped in Home Invasion Near Acapulco
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Six Tourists Are Raped In Home Invasion Near Acapulco
